text: Which of these is Venus visibly lacking in Botticelli's “Birth of Venus”?
What event inspired Aerosmith’s “Dude (Looks Like a Lady)”?
A: Steven Tyler looks like a lady.
B: Steven Tyler drunkenly put on makeup and a dress, trying to fool heavy metal vocalist Vince Neil into dating him.
C: Steven Tyler spotted a lady at a bar who turned out to be heavy metal vocalist Vince Neil.

text: Which food is traditionally a main ingredient in mock turtle soup?
Famous director Francis Ford Coppola holds a US patent for a t-shirt that does what?
A: Contains anti-microbial cellulose triacetate fibers extracted from recycled film reels.
B: Displays a grid on the back, allowing the wearer to easily identify what part of their back itches
C: Is dyed with red wine, causing any wine spills to be invisible.
D: Attaches the sleeves with velcro, allowing them to be removed if desired.
